entry.title: 202307W4 Concerts and Podcasts
entry.summary:
Itâ€™s been a while since I went for a run, but this week Iâ€™m gradually getting back to my previous level of exercise. Iâ€™ve been indulging in hotpot and barbecue lately, and my weight reached nearly 137 pounds. Although itâ€™s still within the normal range, but I want to control it at 135 pounds to avoid excessive weight gain from consuming too many snacks. So, once it goes over 135, Iâ€™ll start running.

Iâ€™ve been following a star photographer, Ziyi Ye, who has been traveling around the world alone for 18 years to capture solar eclipses. I really admire such a girl. I often watch documentaries about the universe, but in Shenzhen, itâ€™s almost impossible to see the stars. When I saw the solar eclipse video she took, I was amazed.

I attended Zhou Chuanxiongâ€™s concert for the first time, and I really love his songs. Before this, I had never spent money to attend a concert, Iâ€™m looking forward to him coming to Shenzhen again!
